thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: GOP Memo Escalates Clash Over Russia Probe

author: Byron Tau
title: GOP Memo Escalates Clash Over Russia Probe
text:
WASHINGTON—A Republican memo released Friday by the House of Representatives alleges abuses in how top law-enforcement officials sought the surveillance of a onetime adviser to Donald Trump, suggesting partisan motives are behind the investigation of ties between the president’s associates and Russia.
The release marked the culmination of tensions this past week between congressional Republicans and the White House on one side, and Democrats and leaders in the Trump administration’s own Justice Department on the other. Top... RELATED VIDEO Why Is the GOP's Classified Memo Important to Trump? The hottest document in Washington right now is a classified memo assembled by the House Intelligence Committee that looks at the way the FBI has handled the investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 campaign. WSJ's Gerald F. Seib explains why the memo is so closely watched and why there has been such a hot debate over whether to make it public. Photo: AP
